name: Content Creation
what_you_do: Salles is a heart-centered quantum energy healer, educator, and visionary leader and creative consultant.
who_you_serve: Salles helps high-stress-high-performance women and men in unique leadership roles recover from being switched on all the time and exhausted from a high impact life.
seeking: Salles is looking for JV partner opportunities.
offering: Salles offers in person and hybrid workshops, group classes, exclusive mastermind programs, weekend healing retreats, international retreats, and concierge care plans.
social_proof: Salles has international volunteer service practicing hands-on energy healing side-by side with physicians in critical burn care, pediatric oncology, and family medicine in 1991, 1992, and 1993 that generated unprecedented medically verified results and a documentary.
signature_programs: Salles offers 'The Well', 'The Climb', and 'The Storm' as book/workbook programs.
audience_type: high-stress-high-performance women and men in unique leadership roles
business_focus: Salles helps high-stress-high-performance individuals recover from exhaustion through quantum energy healing and holistic services.
service_provided: energy healing, education, visionary leadership, creative consulting
